com.codemelon.graph.vertex

Interface ComponentVertex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Vertex
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    OrderedDfsVertex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectedOrderedDfsVertex

    public interface ComponentVertex
extends Vertex
    Vertex supporting a field for distinguishing different components of a graph.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FIRST_COMPONENT_NUMBER
      The starting number when numbering components.

    • Method Summary
